text: And David heard it 25. 39 Heb. and Alex. insert 'that Nabal was dead.and said, Blessed be the Lord, who has judged the cause of my reproach at the hand of Nabal, and has delivered his servant 25. 39 Or, from the hand of wicked men.from the power of evil; and the Lord has returned the mischief of Nabal upon his own head.
